players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We should all work together to find out who did this."
Diana: "I think we should investigate Charlie, he seems suspicious to me."
Charlie: "I'm not suspicious, I'm just trying to do my job. We should focus on finding the real mafioso."
You: "I agree with Diana that we need to focus on finding the real mafioso. Let's all work together and share any information we have."
